My only complaint which is minor is it took a bit to get a seat for 5.  Once we did the food was delicious.  We had grilled scallions, which were delicious (peel them first), octopus, tuna, a ham and mushroom dish but our favorites were the peeled shrimp, mini hamburger and a cured ham sandwich with a little truffle oil,  this seemed to be the group favorite.  The desserts were equally fantastic.   So far the best meal I've had in my several visits to Barcelona!
